query eventsFeed ( $accountIDs:[ID!] $eventFeedFieldFilterInput:[EventFeedFieldFilterInput!] $marker:String $fieldNames:[EventFieldName!]) {
	eventsFeed ( accountIDs:$accountIDs filters:$eventFeedFieldFilterInput marker:$marker ) {
		marker
		fetchedCount
		accounts {
			id
			errorString
			records ( fieldNames:$fieldNames   ) {
				time
				fieldsMap
				flatFields
			}
		}
	}	
}
